item.title: By: One in Three: Inherited Resources, Has Scope and Responders | Plataforma Tecnologia Blog

item.description: [...] Resources. This initial implementation provided a nice test suite and several use cases for a improved Rails’ implementation, based in Responders, which encapsulates all the behavior in one class, and can be added, modified [...]

item.title: By: Jesse Rankin
item.dc:creator: Jesse Rankin
item.description: +1 for adding the state transfer functionality. That is something that has always bugged me about rails' rest implementation.
item.content:encoded: +1 for adding the state transfer functionality. That is something that has always bugged me about rails’ rest implementation.
